nodes.text: Sesfan was a male Mon Calamari Commander in the New Republic in 9 ABY who served as Admiral Ackbar's representative on the Council.

Sesfan served in the Mon Calamari space fleet before joining Rebel Alliance six months before the Battle of Endor. He was sensor operator on Ackbar's ship. He was soon promoted to the rank of commander and became Ackbar's aide and his representative to the New Republic Ruling Council.
Sesfan was heavier than was typical of Mon Calamari and his skin was paler than normal. It was thought he might have a case of Mon Calamari Nerveshock but medical test were negative.
Sesfan had the typical Mon Calamari respect for law and order, and a strong dislike for smugglers.
